question: A patient was administered an injection of zoledronic acid, 1 mg, for osteoporosis. Which HCPCS Level II code should be used for this drug?
A patient had a percutaneous nephrostomy tube placement. What CPT code should be used for this service?
Sarah uses a continuous positive airway pressure CPAP device for her sleep apnea. Which HCPCS Level II code pertains to the CPAP device?
In CPT coding, what is the purpose of a modifier?

choices.A: Indicate that a service or procedure has been altered by specific circumstances
choices.B: Distinguish between different services or procedures
choices.C: Indicate the location of a service or procedure
choices.D: Assign a specific dollar value to a service or procedure

question: Megan had been facing difficulty urinating. Her urologist performed a cystourethroscopy to diagnose the issue. Which CPT code describes this procedure?
During his physical therapy, John was provided with a therapeutic elastic band. Which HCPCS Level II code represents the supply of this band?
Dr. Mitchell administered anesthesia for a patient having a closed procedure on the humerus and elbow. What CPT code should be used?
Which part of the brain is responsible for regulating vital functions like heartbeat and breathing?

While shaving, Robert accidentally caused a small cut on his chin that later became infected. He visited a healthcare provider who incised and drained the infected area. Which CPT code covers the incision and drainage of an infected cut?
During a follow-up visit, Dr. Allen asked Emily about the progress of her symptoms, her current medications, and performed a limited examination. Which CPT code represents this level of service?
Dr. Allen saw a 7-year-old patient for an annual checkup. He took a comprehensive history and performed a detailed examination. Which CPT code should be used for this service?

Dr. Johnson saw Sarah in the ER after she experienced a severe asthma attack. After stabilization, he conducted a comprehensive review of her systems and medical history. Which CPT code represents this level of history-taking?
During a routine check-up, Mark was diagnosed with essential (primary) hypertension. Which ICD 10 CM code represents this condition?
During a hernia repair, Dr. Stevens administered anesthesia to ensure Michael was comfortable and pain-free. Which CPT code represents anesthesia for an inguinal hernia repair?
After a fall, Clara's primary care doctor ordered an X-ray of her wrist. The radiologist took three views of her wrist. Which CPT code pertains to this X-ray?
The heart is enclosed in a double-layered sac called the:
Jackson has been feeling pain and pressure in his sinuses. The ENT decided to perform a sinusotomy to improve drainage. Which CPT code represents this procedure?
Dr. Sanders ordered an ultrasound of a pregnant uterus with a detailed fetal and maternal evaluation for the first trimester. What CPT code is appropriate for this service?
For his severe back pain, Dr. Simmons administers an epidural injection to Mike. Which HCPCS Level II code corresponds to the supply of the injection?
Ryan has had chronic sinusitis for months. The doctor advised functional endoscopic sinus surgery (FESS) to clear the blockages. Which CPT code should be used for this procedure?
Nina, who had been dealing with depression, visited a psychiatrist who prescribed her a 30-minute psychotherapy session. Which CPT code is appropriate for individual psychotherapy for 30 minutes?
While hiking, Alex slipped on a rock and hurt his ankle. At the hospital, they discovered a hematoma that needed to be incised and drained. Which CPT code represents this procedure?
A child was diagnosed with otitis media, unspecified. Which ICD-10-CM code corresponds to this diagnosis?
During a routine check-up, Brian was diagnosed with benign essential hypertension. What ICD 10 CM code should be used for this diagnosis?
Dr. Roberts performed a subtotal thyroid lobectomy with contralateral subtotal lobectomy. What CPT code should be used for this procedure?
Ryan had been experiencing chronic chest pain. His cardiologist ordered a chest CT scan with contrast. Which CPT code represents a CT of the chest with contrast?
After a series of tests, Dr. Wright determined that Katie had a kidney stone and recommended a percutaneous nephrostolithotomy. Which CPT code corresponds to this procedure?
A patient was diagnosed with generalized anxiety disorder. What ICD-10-CM code should be used for this diagnosis?
A patient received an injection of epoetin alfa, 1000 units, for anemia. Which HCPCS Level II code corresponds to this drug?
A patient underwent a CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis with contrast. Which CPT code should be used for this procedure?
A patient was diagnosed with mild intermittent asthma, uncomplicated. Which ICD-10-CM code is appropriate for this condition?
Dr. Gray performs a biopsy of the larynx through an endoscope. Which CPT code should be used for this procedure?
A child had a frenotomy performed on the tongue. What CPT code should be used for this service?
Dr. Parker recommended a colonoscopy for Maria due to her family history of colorectal cancer. Which CPT code represents a diagnostic colonoscopy?
Dr. Hughes performed a parathyroidectomy or exploration of the parathyroid. Which CPT code should be used for this service?
A patient had a complete blood count (CBC) with automated differential WBC count. Which CPT code represents this test?
Ella went to the doctor after experiencing pain from a swollen salivary gland. The doctor performed a sialolithotomy. Which CPT code represents this procedure?
Dr. Clark ordered a basic metabolic panel (8 tests). What CPT code should be used for this lab service?

Ryan had been experiencing chronic chest pain. During a diagnostic procedure, the anesthesiologist administered anesthesia to keep him comfortable. Which CPT code represents anesthesia for intrathoracic procedures?
A patient undergoes an excision of a lesion on their lip, measuring 2 cm. Which CPT code corresponds to this procedure?
'Osteoporosis' describes a condition where:

choices.D: Bones become brittle and fragile due to loss of tissue

question: A patient was diagnosed with acute bronchitis due to respiratory syncytial virus. Which ICD-10-CM code represents this diagnosis?
A patient with diabetes was provided with an insulin pump. Which HCPCS Level II code corresponds to this device?
In medical terminology, the prefix 'osteo-' relates to which of the following?
A patient was diagnosed with streptococcal pharyngitis. Which ICD-10-CM code represents this condition?
Dr. Watson ordered an MRI of the brain without contrast material. What CPT code corresponds to this service?
After tests indicated abnormal parathyroid function, Natalie underwent a parathyroidectomy. Which CPT code represents this procedure?

While eating popcorn, Mike felt a sharp pain and found he had bitten the inside of his cheek, causing a mucocele. His dentist performed a removal of the mucocele. Which CPT code pertains to this procedure?
Dr. Patterson had a 20-minute consultation with a 55-year-old male with a family history of heart disease. What CPT code corresponds to this service?
What does the term 'hepatitis' describe?
A patient was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes mellitus with hyperosmolarity without nonketotic hyperglycemic-hyperosmolar coma (NKHHC). Which ICD-10-CM code corresponds to this diagnosis?
Dr. Harris performs a removal of a 2 cm malignant lesion from a patient's chest. What CPT code should be used for this procedure?
A patient had a tumor excised from the floor of their mouth, measuring 2.5 cm. Which CPT code is appropriate for this procedure?
Lucas, a professional swimmer, developed a cyst in his arm due to repetitive motion. The doctor decided to excise the cyst. Which CPT code represents the excision of a cyst?
The term 'arthralgia' refers to which of the following conditions?
The scapula is commonly known as which bone?
Dr. Lopez performs an excision of a tumor on the knee joint, deep, measuring 3.5 cm. What CPT code should be used for this procedure?
Dr. Lewis suspected a liver issue with Lily and ordered a comprehensive metabolic panel. Which CPT code is for a comprehensive metabolic panel?
What does the term 'bradycardia' refer to?
What is the main purpose of the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)?

choices.A: Provide health insurance to those without it
choices.D: Ensure all Americans have access to healthcare

question: Dr. Allen treats a patient for a skin tag removal on the neck. What CPT code corresponds to this service?
After a car accident, Liam required a retrograde pyelography to assess kidney damage. Which CPT code should be used for this procedure?
Dr. Thompson performed a pyelostomy for drainage. Which CPT code should be used for this procedure?
What does the term 'nephrolithiasis' refer to?
What does the term 'thrombocytopenia' describe?

choices.A: Increased number of red blood cells
choices.B: Decreased number of white blood cells

question: Leo visited a cardiologist due to chest pain. The doctor took an extended history, reviewed multiple systems, and performed a detailed examination. Which CPT code represents this level of service?
Riley had an overactive thyroid and was recommended for a thyroid lobectomy. Which CPT code pertains to this procedure?
During a regular checkup, Dr. Stevens discovered a suspicious lesion on the floor of Paul's mouth and decided to perform an excision. Which CPT code covers the excision of an oral lesion?
A patient had a lipid panel test. Which CPT code should be used for this service?
Bianca visited an oral surgeon due to a cyst under her tongue. The surgeon decided to perform a marsupialization of the ranula. Which CPT code is appropriate for this procedure?
Sophie, after a minor car accident, had a nosebleed that wouldn't stop. The ER doctor performed a nasal endoscopy to control the posterior nosebleed. Which CPT code is appropriate for this procedure?
David uses a manual wheelchair due to his mobility limitations. Which HCPCS Level II code pertains to a standard manual wheelchair?
Dr. Patterson performed a coronary therapeutic services and coronary artery bypass graft. Which CPT code represents a single coronary artery bypass graft using a venous graft?
A patient was provided with a semi-electric (motorized) hospital bed due to mobility challenges. Which HCPCS Level II code represents this type of hospital bed?
A patient undergoes a biopsy of a soft tissue mass on the forearm, subcutaneous. Which CPT code is appropriate for this procedure?
Lucas went to the hospital after noticing blood in his urine. The doctor performed a renal biopsy. Which CPT code represents this procedure?
A patient has an abscess on the arm that Dr. Clarke incises and drains. Which CPT code best describes this service?
Sophie, pregnant with her first child, went for an ultrasound in her second trimester. Which CPT code is appropriate for a routine obstetric ultrasound of a fetus?

Ella's doctor suspected she might have diabetes. He ordered a Hemoglobin A1c test to assess her average blood sugar levels over the past three months. Which CPT code represents the Hemoglobin A1c test?
Dr. Smith performs a removal of a 1.5 cm benign lesion from a patient's face. Which CPT code best represents this procedure?
The Relative Value Unit (RVU) associated with a CPT code reflects:

choices.B: The average time a procedure takes
choices.C: The cost associated with performing the procedure

question: For outpatient coding, what should be the primary diagnosis?

choices.A: The diagnosis that is most resource intensive
choices.B: The diagnosis that was chiefly responsible for the outpatient service
choices.C: The condition that was most severe
choices.D: The first condition listed in the medical record

question: Dr. White performed a urethral dilation for a female patient. Which CPT code is appropriate for this procedure?

Olivia went to the pediatrician for her annual checkup. The doctor conducted a comprehensive review covering her past, family, and social history. Which CPT code represents this level of history-taking?
Dr. Hamilton had a 10-minute phone consultation with a patient to discuss lab results. Which CPT code corresponds to this service?
Which of the following is a consequence of non-compliance with the Stark Law?
During her yoga class, Claire felt a sharp pain in her thigh. The doctor diagnosed her with a seroma that needed drainage. Which CPT code should be used for the drainage of a seroma?
After a trip to a tropical country, Jessica was diagnosed with Dengue fever without warning signs. Which ICD-10-CM code represents this diagnosis?
What is the main goal of the Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health (HITECH) Act?

choices.A: Promote the adoption and meaningful use of health information technology
choices.B: Ensure all Americans have health insurance
choices.C: Protect patient privacy and health information

question: Leo had been experiencing difficulty breathing and went to a clinic. The doctor performed a procedure to remove nasal polyps. Which CPT code corresponds to this procedure?
After weeks of sinus congestion, Olivia saw an ENT specialist. The doctor decided to perform a nasal endoscopy. Which CPT code describes this procedure?
A patient has an incision and drainage of an abscess in the submandibular space. Which CPT code represents this procedure?
A patient underwent a diagnostic electromyography on 2 extremities. Which CPT code is appropriate for this procedure?
Lena, a 28-year-old, was diagnosed with a mild form of endometriosis. Which ICD 10 CM code corresponds to her diagnosis?
Tom was diagnosed with bilateral primary osteoarthritis of the knee. Which ICD 10 CM code is suitable for this diagnosis?
A patient underwent a thyroidectomy, total or complete. Which CPT code is appropriate for this procedure?
Samantha was diagnosed with acute sinusitis due to Streptococcus pneumoniae. What ICD 10 CM code corresponds to her condition?
Ethan, experiencing persistent flank pain, underwent a diagnostic renal angiography. Which CPT code represents this procedure?
A patient had a liver function test. Which CPT code is suitable for this test?
Experiencing persistent headaches, Daniel was sent for an MRI of his brain. Which CPT code covers an MRI of the brain without contrast?
